uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.apps

Class CommandLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.AbstractContexed
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.apps.CommandLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed

    public class CommandLauncher
extends AbstractContexed
    Class to run a Command from the command-line. This class can be sub-classed to customise the AppContext creation.
